data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EsUbGp1VufQQ7kNvgGKbdn_&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBtLFImA6ds1RxM34-YqpFiY62DX6ctjE8H6fy_42N-cg&oe=6692659C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4zApeAc4ZRIQ7kNvgEgZARv&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAdq-_eszNjhUPmSrTmX4Cub0BSxVpjv4QeqL9V6xClBg&oe=66926F24)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QZMbTmfKEDYQ7kNvgFoQ78s&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD-TW5hGvvVRfB20JUlLG0-qEzIh6rqq51XawwYZZZp7g&oe=66925687)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QqMTGIr_ArkQ7kNvgES9x8V&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAhIg5AKjvDIZUUE0EqAr2zenIi_JEKpXV84L2z8QKD-Q&oe=66924966)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3Zm18YYTX0MQ7kNvgHbPtdA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA_qqUCuHRekYKaMYoMD7TpJRW0ZSAzETcN2VjIlUhEFg&oe=669275D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8dzpbL0-gZsQ7kNvgGJfQBA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDT_WXfZ-QppFzgOgt3mijCeEdKbrG2EqoO8gEL-z49GA&oe=66927259)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=JPH4B1ROlNUQ7kNvgGKus7R&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBbWxi9V-sDYRImE1seebhKyfB8MKgTjxpQ0Blvbcb_xQ&oe=66925870)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0iR8d8ioOLAQ7kNvgF-zFX-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA9xs8hg4_4U271ttmUg8eBU84s9ChI1VrPUSy4WeAugQ&oe=669242EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=cCCRMAaErYYQ7kNvgEmSxMH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA_r9mfsCGcf27NeKBxdB61j1Pr6B44CUqkbQDbw8lhKw&oe=66925697)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wE7-NwfgZKwQ7kNvgEuT28F&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDkuEd3Wwh5U6fjSaLWruXLwRzPjRd-z4bBc-pI9HjOOg&oe=6692720C)
